resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="mapping9",
    rules={
        "field": {
            "realm.name": "cloud-saml"
        }
    },
    role_templates=[
        {
            "template": {
                "source": "saml_user"
            }
        },
        {
            "template": {
                "source": "_user_{{username}}"
            }
        }
    ],
    enabled=True,
)
print(resp)
